component.name: ExtractRegions
component.doc: This component takes the peakstats file of GetTrueRegion and a posterior cut-off. All peaks below this cut-off get written to outfile.

input.name: regions
input.doc: Aligned or single sequences in fasta format. Headers contain peak ID.

input.name: peakstats
input.doc: Output of GetTrueRegions. Contains summed peak posteriors.

output.name: outfile
output.doc: Alignments or single sequences that made posterior cut-off

parameter.name: posterior_cutoff
parameter.doc: All regions below this cut-off are given out.
